verses.verse: Then again <S%H7725><s%> I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H5774><s%>, behold, a flying roll <S%H4039><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7200><s%>, What seest thou <S%H559><s%>? And I answered, I see <S%H7200><s%> a flying <S%H5774><s%> roll <S%H4039><s%>; the length <S%H753><s%> thereof is twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H423><s%>, This is the curse that goeth forth <S%H3318><s%> over the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole land <S%H776><s%>: for every one that stealeth <S%H1589><s%> shall be cut off <S%H5352><s%> on the one side according <S%H3644><s%> to it <S%H7650><s%>; and every one that sweareth shall be cut off <S%H5352><s%> on the other side according to it <S%H3644><s%>.

I will cause it to go forth <S%H3318><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and it shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the thief <S%H1590><s%>, and into the house <S%H1004><s%> of him that sweareth <S%H7650><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%>; and it shall abide <S%H3885><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>, and shall consume <S%H3615><s%> it with the timber <S%H6086><s%> thereof and the stones thereof <S%H68><s%>.

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me went forth <S%H3318><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H5375><s%>, Lift up now thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> what is this that goeth forth <S%H3318><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%>, What is it <S%H559><s%>? And he said, This is the ephah <S%H374><s%> that goeth forth <S%H3318><s%>. He said <S%H559><s%> moreover <S%H5869><s%>, This is their appearance in all the land <S%H776><s%>

(and <S%H5375><s%>, behold, there was lifted up a talent <S%H3603><s%> of lead <S%H5777><s%>); and this is a <S%H259><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the ephah <S%H374><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, This is Wickedness <S%H7564><s%>: and he cast <S%H7993><s%> her down into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the ephah <S%H374><s%>; and he cast <S%H7993><s%> the weight <S%H68><s%> of lead <S%H5777><s%> upon the mouth thereof <S%H6310><s%>.

Then lifted I up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H3318><s%>, behold, there came forth two <S%H8147><s%> women <S%H802><s%>, and the wind <S%H7307><s%> was in their wings <S%H3671><s%>; now they had <S%H2007><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> like the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a stork <S%H2624><s%>; and they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> the ephah <S%H374><s%> between earth <S%H776><s%> and heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> I to the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me <S%H3212><s%>, Whither do these bear the ephah <S%H374><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1129><s%>, To build her a house <S%H1004><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar <S%H8152><s%>: and when it is prepared <S%H3559><s%>, she shall be set <S%H3240><s%> there in her own place <S%H4369><s%>.
